# completeUntilFirstUserAuthentication

**Type Property**

An option that instructs the system to store the file in an encrypted format on-disk that your app can’t access until after the device boots.

## Declaration

```swift
static let completeUntilFirstUserAuthentication: URLFileProtection
```

## Discussion

After the user unlocks the device for the first time, your app can access the file and continue to access it even if the user subsequently locks the device.

## Protection levels

- **complete**: An option that instructs the system to store the file in an encrypted format on-disk that your app can’t access for reading or writing to while the device is locked or booting.
- **completeUnlessOpen**: An option that instructs the system to store the file in an encrypted format on-disk after it closes.
- **completeWhenUserInactive**: An option that instructs the system to store the file in an encrypted format on-disk that your app can access only after device unlock and before expiration.
- **none**: An option that indicates the file has no special protections associated with it.
